name: Bird Watcher
description: Bird Watcher is a short story about a girl whose name is Claire that after her parent's death was made to live with her gloomy vicious aunt. Her life in the new house becomes similar to the life in the cage which is full of stringent prohibitions and rules. And every day is absolutely the same as previous one.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 Processor: 1.60Ghz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX10 compatible DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1100 MB available space
